dct_title_s: Relief map of part of Mohave Desert region, California, showing desert watering places
dct_alternative_sm: Relief map of part of Mohave Desert region, California, showing desert watering places
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights.; "Compiled from plane-table surveys by David G. Thompson ... Relief shading by John H. Renshawe."; "Watering-place survey by David G. Thompson. Surveyed in 1917-1920."; Plates IX-XIII from the U.S. Geological Survey Water-supply paper 490.
on sheets 96 x 45 centimeters, or smaller +
